original_title: Trains on main line delayed after ‘Senkadagala Manike’ derails
original_body_lines: Train services on the Colombo – Kandy main line have been delayed after a Colombo-bound train derailed between Rambukkana and Kadigamuwa railway stations.
The ‘Senkadagala Manike’ train was plying towards Colombo from Kandy when it had derailed, Sri Lanka Railways reported.
